survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from gym members to improve facilities, services, and overall member satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit the gym per week?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice response. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you visit the gym per week?

questions.question_text: Which gym facilities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include major facility types.

script.question_text: Which gym facilities do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the gym?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure consistent scale direction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness of the gym?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the availability of equipment during your visits?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale. Ensure options are clear and unambiguous.

script.question_text: How would you rate the availability of equipment during your visits?

questions.question_text: Have you participated in any group fitness classes at the gym?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no radio button.

script.question_text: Have you participated in any group fitness classes at the gym?

questions.question_text: If yes, which group fitness classes have you attended? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q5 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option.

script.question_text: If yes, which group fitness classes have you attended? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q5 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of group fitness classes offered?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q5 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure consistent scale direction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of group fitness classes offered?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q5 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the gym staff's friendliness and helpfulness?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure consistent scale direction.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the gym staff's friendliness and helpfulness?

questions.question_text: Have you used personal training services at the gym?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no radio button.

script.question_text: Have you used personal training services at the gym?

questions.question_text: If yes, how would you rate the quality of personal training services?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q9 answer is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale. Ensure options are clear and unambiguous.

script.question_text: If yes, how would you rate the quality of personal training services?
script.routing_logic: Only appears if Q9 answer is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this gym to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for Net Promoter Score (NPS) calculation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this gym to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the gym?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Allow for long text input.
